name: Dungeon Simulator (Kid Yeti)
description:
You play the Evil Villain who just wants a rest from heroes attacking him. Day after day they attack. Defend yourself and take the heroes gold.

We Have Walls, Fireballs, Iceballs (They Freeze no damage), Spike Floors, Skeletons and Bats to defend yourself with!!

Instructions

Key Num 1 for Build Mode

Key Num 2 for DestroyMode

Build Mode - Up and Down Arrows to Select Items and Left Click to Place

Destroy Mode - Left Click on what you want to destroy

You can only destroy what you have placed down and you get all the gold back from what you destroy.

SPACE for Hero to come

M to mute Music
